tool_description: An API showing all the latest Abortion related news around the world
name: Abortion Live
title: Abortion Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about abortion from specific news resources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://abortion-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/nytimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "abortion-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://abortion-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "abortion-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Abortion Related News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Abortions from all over the world
